name: Candy Night
description:
Game created for: Trijam #193: The 3 hour game jam How does this relate to theme of jam "Patience!"? During the game, you will wait for the right timing for the jump.

Controls:
W, Space, Up arrow, Left click - to jump
R - restart level
Esc - back to menu

Total time of developing - 2h50min +/-

Credits:

Scripts - me
Music and sounds - also me 
Visual - me and friend (anon)
Concept - also anon friend :)

Soft and utilities:

Graphic - Aseprite
Music - FL Studio
Sounds - generated by https://sfxr.me/
Engine: C2
Fonts - created by https://fontmeme.com/pixel-fonts/ and https://opengameart.org/content/pixelart-fantasy-font-for-construct-2
